title: K-Edge MAX computer mounts get yoked for bigger GPS head unit & light combos
content:
When the original K-Edge computer mounts debuted, Garmins were a lot smaller. And lighter. Since then, They’ve added the Pro mounts to handle adding a light or GoPro underneath. But we kept pushing it, didn’t we? Now, they’ve introduced the new K-Edge MAX computer mounts, designed to hold your mega GPS cycling computer and high-powered, […]

The post K-Edge MAX computer mounts get yoked for bigger GPS head unit & light combos appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
